data.text:
Due to the travel restrictions set by the destination countries we are cancelling all flights to the following destinations from 1 April. 
• Denmark (CPH) until 13 April
• Latvia (RIX) until 14 April
• Norway (OSL) until 14 April

data.text:
@nnnaej Hi! If your flight is cancelled you can have full refund, otherwise it goes according to ticket rules. If you have booked via our websites, file refund form. In case you have booked via travel agency, kindly contact directly to them. https://t.co/oFFK2IPFcB
-Helmi

@SamBanks97 Hi! Sorry to hear that you've been trouble to contact us. We can check your booking, if you send your booking reference and contact details via DM. Please notice that this channel is very congested at the moment and it may take several days to answer. // Helmi

data.text: Our customer service is working hard to help you in this exceptional situation caused by the coronavirus outbreak. We are at your service on Facebook Messenger, Twitter, via a chat on https://t.co/906IMFcH8u and by phone. We apologize for the longer than usual queuing times. https://t.co/ouSOctKsB3

@luleeaberra Sorry for the delay in replying. If you still need help with this, please DM us your booking reference, names of the passengers, travel dates and e-mail address on the booking so we can have a look at this. / Elli

@ChakLo7 Hi! Sorry for late reply, good to notice that you've managed to change tickets already :) For security reasons, could you delete previous message where you've sent your booking reference. -Helmi

@sipila_k Hi,
Sorry for the delay in replying. If you still need assistance with this, please advise your booking reference, e-mail address on the booking and Finnair Plus membership number so we can have a look at this.

Regards,
Elli
@JMaGONZA Hi Juan! Sorry that you had problems to contact us, hope you managed to get through! -Helmi

@rimonone Hei! Pahoittelut viiveestä vastauksessa ja kiitoksia palautteestasi, välitetään eteenpäin. Mikäli voisimme näin Twitterin välityksellä olla avuksi, lähetäthän lisää tietoja matkavarauksestasi (Varaustunnus, sähköpostiosoitteesi ja puhelinnumerosi) yksityisviestillä (DM). -Niki
@ULI_UseLessInfo Hi Owen,  I apologize for the late answer. Please send your booking details to us by DM so I can check. //Jukka-Pekka

@erkkatapio Hi, the emissions calculator gives you the carbon dioxide emissions of your flight. The connection between emissions and global warming is well established. In total, it has been calculated that global air travel causes between 2 to 3 per cent of all global emissions. /Krista

We have been awarded as the most sustainable airline in @sb_index in Finland but we are not celebrating yet. We are happy to lead the pack but we all need to run faster and do more. Read more about our sustainability efforts: https://t.co/JqDN584QxH https://t.co/OwKwnx8Abh

@Imkaur_ Hi! My apologies for the late reply. If there is anything I could help you with, please send your booking details to us by DM. For your own security, please delete this public tweet because you have added your booking reference. //Jukka-Pekka

data.text: We understand that the coronavirus situation has left you with many questions regarding reservation changes and cancellations. We have collected some of the most frequently asked questions and advice for what you can do if your travel is affected: https://t.co/zmU1DjS7x2 https://t.co/CiiadZ8G7h

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: @Alex90262718 Hi! If your Finnair-flight has been cancelled, you can apply for refund. If your booking has been made via travel agency, please contact them. If your booking has been made via us, you can do refund request online, please find more details here: https://t.co/78QniYxucf //Anu

Flights to/from Kittilä, Kuusamo and Ivalo are cancelled from Monday 30 March onwards. We will also cancel several flights this week to/from Kittilä, Kuusamo and Ivalo. We will fly some flights until Sunday to bring customers home. https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X

RT @foreignerfi: Aircraft boarding is also monitored to ensure that passengers can withstand the physical stresses of flight. #finnair 

@F…

@ahhhhmebollix Hi, I have replied to you via DM to discuss more about your options.

- Joni
@laurengrodstein My apologies for the delay of this reply. If there's anything we could do to help you currently, please send us more info via private message (DM). -Niki
@biomedicinista Hi! Yes, your tracking period is one year form the new expiring date. -Helmi

data.text: We are cancelling our flights to Tokyo from 26 March due to travel restrictions in Japan. We'll fly to Narita airport from Helsinki on Wed 25 March and back to Helsinki on 26 March. We intend to start flying to Haneda airport from 3 May, travel restrictions permitting.

@personaleu Hei Kurt, pahoittelut viivästyneestä vastauksesta. Pyytäisin poistamaan tämän tweetin, koska olet ilmottanut tässä varaustunnuksesi. Tämän jälkeen lähettäisitkö meille yksityiviestillä varauksen tiedot sekä puhelinnumeron ja sähköpostiosoitteesi niin tarkistetaan. //Jukka-Pekka

@hetikkanen Tästä kannattaa olla meidän aspaan yhteydessä chatilla tai puhelimitse. Tämänhetkinen jonotusaika on viimeisimmän tiedon mukaan 15min. Yhteystiedot: https://t.co/XPce2jm8HD Heidi / Finnair

@Ralpharama Hi! I'm sorry to hear about your situation. Have you created a feedback via our website? If not, I can forward the feedback to our CR team. If you want me to forward your case, please tell me your ticket number, reservation code and your email address as a DM. - Hannu

@Juliette_Oleary You can postpone your travel free of charge up till 30th Nov.  We are handling flights departing within 72 hours at the moment but will be in contact with you closer to your depature. /Sari

data.text: @Juliette_Oleary Hello Juliette, my apologies for a delayed reply. I checked that you are able to change your flights at https://t.co/sthXHFVZLv. You just need to fill your family name exactly as it is written in the ticket  + booking ref.

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: @lenabl0m Hi! If you would like us to take a look on your booking, please DM your booking reference, passenger name(s) and also route. Please find more details also here: https://t.co/78QniYxucf //Anu

@KZerni @ArjaSuominen Hei, olemme lisänneet aspan resursseja, mutta peruimme niin valtavan määrän lentoja, että siellä on valitettavasti väistämättä ruuhkaa. Pyydämme asiakkailta kärsivällisyyttä tässä haastavassa tilanteessa. Teemme kaikkemme palvellaksemme jokaista mahd. nopeasti. Heidi / Finnair

@MikkoUtecht Kiva kuulla :) Hyvää keväänjatkoa, pysy terveenä :) /Elli

@chris36314926 Sorry for the long handling times. All our channels have been congested lately. If you still need assistance, please DM us booking reference, travel dates, names of the passengers and e-mail address on the booking so we can have a look at this. / Elli
@SampsaLaine Kiitos Sampsa! Hyvää keväänjatkoa, pysy terveenä :) - Elli
@HeliFromFinland Hieno kuulla! Hyvää keväänjatkoa, pysy terveenä :) -Elli

If your flight is cancelled, here are your options. 

You can find our refund form from here: https://t.co/rnFQkDGotv

And frequently asked questions from here: https://t.co/G9wBHVOUB8 https://t.co/f2DshMS63Z
@Tigmac1 Hi, please see this screenshot. The refund form can be found here: https://t.co/rnFQkDGotv /Krista from Finnair https://t.co/ICWrdoUQn3

@Tigmac1 Hi, yes, unfortunately. At this point, we are cancelling flights from our systems until end of June 2020.  However, we have the ability to ramp up our operations fast when the situation allows. /Krista from Finnair
@vuodentraveller Hei Hanne, pahoittelut vastauksen viiveestä. Toivottavasti saitte apua toista kanavaa pitkin ja uudet lennot Helsinkiin. //Roosa

data.text: We know that many of our customers are worried if they can get back home due to the coronavirus situation. We do our best to carry you home from your destination in this difficult situation. We have added flights from the most popular destinations.

@davidktagle Apologies for the delay, all our lines are congested atm. If you still need assistance, please DM us your booking reference, travel dates, names of the passengers and e-mail address on the booking. If the booking is made through a travel agency, please contact them. / Elli

@MyllyMe @FinnairHelps We are operating the Tokyo-Helsinki leg with a limited schedule also through the coming months. Our customer service will get back to you about the Auckland-Tokyo leg, as that's operated by a codeshare partner. Heidi / Finnair
@MyllyMe @FinnairHelps You can also check the up-to-date flight information for the upcoming few days here: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X Hope this helps! Heidi / Finnair

@MyllyMe @FinnairHelps We are cancelling our flights gradually, as it's not possible to remove them all from our system simultaneously. That's why you might see cancelled flights as active. The latest cancellation list is available here: https://t.co/CoAZRMIAj8

data.text: @dphughes1979 Hi Dan, we have just replied to you by private message (DM). Please reply back to that private message. Br Henna
@Mifkata No problem at all! Heidi / Finnair
@DECENTPRASHANT Hi, I just sent you a DM. Please remove your pubic tweet with your booking reference for you own security. /Keijo

@Mifkata If you’ve bought the ticket through Travelgenio, you need to contact them to make changes. When you’ve bought your ticket from a 3rd party, you unfortunately can’t make changes to it on our website. Heidi / Finnair
@Mifkata Where did you buy your ticket? Heidi / Finnair

We have cancelled more flights. The most up to date list of cancellations is now available here: https://t.co/9ByUu2gSoQ Please only contact our customer service if you have a reservation within 72 hours. https://t.co/ekkg35lx8f

urls.title: Takaisinmaksu
urls.description: Tällä lomakkeella voit hakea takaisinmaksua käyttämättömästä lipusta tai lento-osuudesta, tai maksullisesta lisäpalvelusta kuten istuinpaikasta tai ateriasta.

data.text: @P_Kilpelainen Hei, perumme useita tuhansia lentoja eikä niitä kaikkia voi mitenkään poistaa järjestelmästä yhtä aikaa, joten osa perutuista näkyy yhä aktiivisena. Voit hakea takaisinmaksua täältä: https://t.co/VnqI8SUcSj Heidi / Finnair

@Mifkata Hi, I'm sorry to hear about the trouble you've had. This is a completely exceptional situation as we've cancelled 90% of our flights. Did you already apply for a refund? https://t.co/Mn7qG0QS9g Heidi / Finnair

data.text: @AnshulGTweets Hi! Sorry for the delay in my response. Our customer service is congested due corona virus issues. Your refund was processed 30JAN at our end and should show on your account under original purchase date 03JAN. However, with Indian cards it may take time to be processed. /Auli
@abol07884669 Hi, I'm sorry to hear about this. If you still need help with this, please send email to lostbaggage@finnair.com //Roosa

data.text: @julialisun Hi, we have just replied to you by private message (DM). Br Henna

urls.title: Refund form
urls.description: With this form, you can request special assistance for your flight if you have a handicap or illness, or inform us about the details of your medical device.

data.text:
@urbandecayed Hi, if your booking was made directly via Finnair and your flight has been canceled, then you can fill in this refund form: https://t.co/oFFK2IPFcB
In other cases you will have to contact the travel agency. //Mari
@astridcrystal_ Hi, please send us a DM with your booking details if there is anything that we could assist you with. //Mari
@katieckatiedid Hi, if your booking is made via a travel agency, then you will have to contact them in order to cancel. Otherwise please send us a DM with your booking details. //Mari

Our customer service is still heavily congested. Please only get in touch if you have a reservation within 72 hours. Include your booking reference, flight details, email address you've used for the booking and what your concern is. More information: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X

@MariKarkkainen Hei Mari, järjestelmät ovat kovin kuormittuneita tällä hetkellä, ja jostain syystä sinun varauksen siirto ei onnistu online, pahoittelut siitä. Laitatko DM viestillä varaustunnuksen, sähköpostiosoitteesi sekä päivämäärät mille ajankohdalle haluaisit lentoja muuttaa? / Kati

data.text: @thejnhec Hi, we have just replied to you by private message (DM). Please reply back to that private message. Br Henna
@drpkchadha Hi! I sent you DM. /Jenni

@cady_crayola Hi! Sorry for my delayed answer!If you have purchased your ticket via travel agent, please apply refund through them. If ticket is bought directly from Finnair, refund application can be found from here: https://t.co/Mn7qG0QS9g  Br,Jenni
@Donna2271 Hi, if your booking was made via Finnair, then please send us a DM with your booking details. Otherwise please contact the travel agency //Mari

@LisenokTX Hi, sorry to hear that. Unfortunately we have longer queues at the moment. Please send us a DM with your booking details. If your booking was made via a travel agency, then please contact them directly. //Mari

urls.title: Takaisinmaksu
urls.description: Tällä lomakkeella voit hakea takaisinmaksua käyttämättömästä lipusta tai lento-osuudesta, tai maksullisesta lisäpalvelusta kuten istuinpaikasta tai ateriasta.

data.text: @travelloverblog @FinnairSuomi @paivyttallqvist Hei Annika, tässä lisätietoa. Takaisinmaksulomake löytyy täältä: https://t.co/VnqI8SUcSj /Krista Finnairilta https://t.co/ps5d3uPfgZ

domain.name: Ongoing News Story
domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

data.text: @IanEasyTiger @FinnairHelps Hi, I am sorry for the delay in response. The coronavirus situation has changed rapidly during the past few days and Finland is closing its borders tomorrow. Please read more information from here: https://t.co/IhwM1NFn2X /Krista from Finnair https://t.co/AtsjaqP4oX

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: Tightened border controls will begin in Finland as of 19 March. See our Travel Updates page to find out how this affects your journey: https://t.co/78QniYxucf https://t.co/Tq33Qla7Fi

@hiimjuanita Hi, sorry to hear this situation. Hope you got this sorted out. If you still need help, please send your booking reference, email address and phone number via DM that we can take a look. //Roosa
